childMdx.excerpt: There's a blaze I heard about long ago, somewhere out there in the mountains, I think.   I set out to search for it, even summited a peak or…
All these years gathering ash and watching it blow away until finally, one still day head down on a  peace ful hill where they buried you…
The  balance  of flames backed by endless ocean and a single sentence from the Voice:   "The story is one of how much I loved."   Beyond…
